website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those who like the idea of the ventilation slats, but others we tested are better options for smaller shoes.
pros: Made of solid cedar and available in 5 sizes
Stands out for having ventilation slats that help keep shoes dry
cons: The heel unit is a bit large and might not accurately fit smaller shoes

customer_reviews.title: Size is too small and the curvature of the shoe trees does not provide a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes trees to protect the longevity of my Allen Edmonds dress shoes. I checked to make sure that these shoe trees were the right product for the dress shoes model and checked the size (8.5 / D) against the sizing chart. While the chart said that it would be borderline but to get a Small, I definitely think that a Medium is a better fit as the shoe tree is very tight inside the shoe. I also don't think that the curvature of the shoe trees provide a great fit. While I had high hopes buying the Manufacturer's product, I think I may have been better off just buying a third party's rendition.
customer_reviews.author: William Chen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Shoe Leather Smooth and Like New
customer_reviews.text: The shoe trees fit very well and really helps undo the leather creases from daily wear. I have the medium shoe tree and use it in a size 11B shoe - per the Allen Edmonds Tree Sizing Chart. The cedar is well shaped and does have the aromatic smell as expected. The heel and toe sections are connected by a black metal rod. Great overall!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Zoghby

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit for AE shoes; not well-finished
customer_reviews.text: I picked the Full Toe model for my recently purchased Allen Edmonds Fifth Avenue Cap Toe because the product description said it is was designed specifically for AE shoes. But when inserted, it could not fully occupy the shoe's entire width. I tried using AE Combination which I bought supposedly for my non-AE shoes and it was a better fit because the width of AE Combination widens upon entry in the shoe unlike the Full Toe which is fixed. Moreover, the cedar wood was not well-finished as there are splinters and sharp edges within the two slits that I had to smoothen it with sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: sct27

customer_reviews.title: Use the AE size guidelines!  Comes with two individual trees: one for L, one for R
customer_reviews.text: These Medium shoe tree fits my Madison Park Oxford wingtips (size 10D) perfectly. The fit is more snug than the AE Medium 'Combination' shoe trees, which I purchased for a separate pair of Edmonds. Let me also clarify some of the vagueness of the picture and above description. This product comes as a matched pair -- not a single tree for one shoe. Amazon should update the picture and description accordingly to avoid confusion.
customer_reviews.author: T. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Its like a wooden foot for your shoe or something more clever than that.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get one pair to try in my Allen Edmonds and of course they are great. They smell nice, fit the shoe well to ensure they will keep their shape over the term of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Jared The Geek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get in an out and a good cedar ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 9.5EEE Allen Edmonds shoes and this fits perfectly in them (Medium). Easy to get in an out and a good cedar smell.
customer_reviews.author: SS 56

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: I only wear my Tuxedo shoes a couple of times a year, and I worry about them getting crushed in between. I'm a size 14, so the XXL barely fit, but that's what I wanted. I cleaned the shoes, put these in, then slid them into old cotton socks to keep dust off and put them away. My only concern is a small one, there did appear to be a couple of spots where sap was coming out of the wood...I'm hoping there's not enough to damage the leather.
customer_reviews.author: HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to make it
customer_reviews.text: This shoe tree works fine, but the shaft that connects the top to the bottom is made of plastic. Other Allen Edmonds shoe trees that I purchased in the past had a metal shaft, so I do have concerns of this plastic breaking at some point considering that it is under constant pressure.
customer_reviews.author: FighterHayabusa

customer_reviews.title: Great wood and solid construction.  Fit could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rich cedar. But even though I am using the recommended size in an Allen Edmonds shoe it doesn't fit as snug as an expanding toe model. I prefer the snug fit in order to help when shining my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stubb

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Fits the AE Strands perfectly and help keep the shape. Also helps neutralize any odors. You can sometimes find these on sale for as low as $10. Apparently Jos A Bank sell the identical shoe trees with a different badge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lafond

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Has the strong cedar smell that reminds me of that chest where grandma keeps wool sweaters. I still haven't decided if this style with a single toe piece is better or worse than the split toe style of shoe tree.
customer_reviews.author: I. Travel

customer_reviews.title: Shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: A quality made shoe tree, with fresh smelling Cedar wood and made in US. They forgot to mention automatic spring adjustment that would make finding your size just a little less worrisome. I am a 101/2 D and a large fits great. I wish it was cheaper but then it would be foreign made and being from the US is worth it. I now have 3 of them and will put them on my wish list for birthdays and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Shoe trees for your new AE shoes  are a must!
customer_reviews.text: If you own Allen Edmonds shoes, this is a MUST. Keep your shoes looking good for many years with AE shoe trees.
customer_reviews.author: Somer Teleo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great spring-loaded action. Wish the toe part was a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: trailmug

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Tree for Allen Edmonds Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of Allen Edmond Shoes and I ordered 2 pairs of Shoe Trees from Shoe Trees Marketplace (Not Allen Edmonds but a different Brand). The Shoe Trees were very small, the original Allen Edmonds Shoe Trees fit perfect on Allen Edmond Shoes. Do not waste your time with different Brands.
customer_reviews.author: Juangram

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoe trees. They fit my shoes perfectly as I would expect. I have other trees from generic sources that aren't as nice and don't fit my Allen Edmonds shoes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you have quality shoes you want to maintain.
customer_reviews.text: If you own a nice pair of leather shoes. This is a must. Keeps the fit, keeps out the wrinkles. The cedar wood is also a great, who doesn't love the smell of cedar? The spring inside keep the shoe stretched, so if you shoes are not fully broken in yet, this seems to help break them in.
customer_reviews.author: W. G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for the smell alone
customer_reviews.text: Great product - well-made and reasonably priced, especially once you consider the cost and longevity of AE's product. I'm buying a second pair. Did I mention they smell amazing?
customer_reviews.author: IFK

customer_reviews.title: a must have for quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are shoes - its a shoe tree I like it - it fits my shoes well and keeps them from creasing too much a much have for quality shoes
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Product

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product -- Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace some cheap Chinese made shoe trees I had previously been using with my Allen Edmonds shoes. These are made in the USA and fit my shoes perfectly. Obviously higher quality, and really fills out the toes a lot better than a cheaper split toe tree. Very impressed. Wish I had bought them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA, Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Medium fits 9.5 men's shoe perfectly. Made in USA. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Raimu II

customer_reviews.title: It's A Shoe Tree. It's fine. Doesn't Feel As Substantial as the ones I bought in 1985.
customer_reviews.text: It's A Shoe Tree. It's fine. It doesn't feel as substantial as the ones I bought in 1985. I prefer this full-piece toe over the Allen Edmonds split toe. I also prefer this full back piece with the handle, over the shoe trees that have a long rod, with a leather pull.
customer_reviews.author: RSC - Nyack, NY

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cedar shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cedar shoe trees. I have 5 or 6 of them. They work perfectly and are easy to use / put in place.
customer_reviews.author: Acitizen

customer_reviews.title: Shoe tree arrived split in half, but good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with what I received, and it fits my size 8 Liverpools beautiful. The smell is very strong in all the best ways. The only dissatisfaction I have is that one of the shoe trees I received was split in half. It is all that it is advertised, aside from That!
customer_reviews.author: Wardaddy

customer_reviews.title: Best of breed
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of shoe trees and these are by far the best products that I've come across. The construction at the joints is superb and strong, the foot of my shoes is well filled, and removal is easy because of the tab on top of the heel. Sizing was perfect for me as and described.
customer_reviews.author: nycebo

customer_reviews.title: Best cedar shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best wood shoe tree, it fits most shoe styles eliminating moisture and lengthen the life of shoes and recently I discover when the cedar aroma is lost sanding it with fine sandpaper will help the cedar aroma to return.
customer_reviews.author: frsf

customer_reviews.title: Bueno
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Allen Edmonds shoe trees after trying many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Peters

customer_reviews.title: I have 8. 5 EEE and I ordered medium ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 8.5 EEE and I ordered medium. It fits, but it will have to force its way in.
customer_reviews.author: mingi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. As always
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. As always, Allen Edmonds quality is second to no one. These are sturdy and well made. They do wonders keeping shoes the correct shape. I use them in my Park Avenues and Nemouks. They fit tight and smell great too.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Very good Cedar Shoe Tree
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and smell very nice. They fit my Allen Edmonds shoes very well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Nehlig

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There's a white stony powder all over the product -and spring is tight. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Paredes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great they fit my Strand 10.5 EEE perfectly. Smell great !
customer_reviews.author: Twil

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for to go with my new Allen Edmonds. Going to get another pair on both shoes and trees.
customer_reviews.author: Raybina

customer_reviews.title: Fit my AE Leeds size 7E perfectly. There finishing ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my AE Leeds size 7E perfectly. There finishing could be improved as rough edges and splinters were found which I touched up accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: dyiong

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe Tree
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look and feel great after using. Easy to insert feel/look well made.
customer_reviews.author: 2Bark

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. True to size. Do the job of keeping shoes looking good. Would definitely purchase again. Smell great and hold shape. Non-adjustable front worked good.
customer_reviews.author: L. Roelant

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep the form of my Johnston and Murphy cap toe balmoral's. Keeps that fresh cedar smell for longer than other shoe tree's I've used. Fit is pretty much on the money.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M

customer_reviews.title: smells nice and keeps the creases / wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Shoe trees for my AEs, no complaints, smells nice and keeps the creases / wrinkles away
customer_reviews.author: bill vuong

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: These Allen Edmond shoe trees are great. I love the smell of cedar. They fit my shoes perfectly. They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect! Although I believe they can be had directly through Allen Edmonds for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in my pair of Allen Edmonds Park Avenues. They are indispensable for maintaining the beauty and extending the life of these rather expensive shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Todd

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these and they work spectacular. Saves my investment in shoes
customer_reviews.author: mafrentress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the size "small "fits a size 8 show very well
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: As described. Make sure you use the shoe chart ...
customer_reviews.text: As described. Make sure you use the shoe chart on Allenedmonds.com
customer_reviews.author: Godric

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe tree.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cedar shoe tree, but I recommend the woodlore epic twin tube shoe tree available here on Amazon. I had the wood split on one of the shoe trees where I used the handle to pull it out of my shoe, and had to super glue it back on. The heel can be a little more narrow than the style I recommended, which puts undue stress on the heel of the shoe when storing it .
customer_reviews.author: Wes Charles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I ordered large, but the ones I received are too wide and longer than the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cedar shoe tree, a must need for any good leather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John sparks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These cost a bit more but are well worth the cost. More stable and great quality. There is not a better one in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Love her

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same as AE
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes these will be cheaper here and sometimes the AE sale is cheaper but always the same quality I've come to expect.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: PICTURE COLOR IS NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows silver emblem and connector - which is what I wanted. Arrived and it was bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Curry

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Excellent for my size 8 regular Allen Edmunds Copley
customer_reviews.text: I got these at the same time when I got my Allen Edmonds Copley dress shoes. This size small fits perfectly into my size 8R. If you got shoes that are 8 and smaller, this size is it. Great cedar smell and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Li

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an AE wingtip in my size that was just so uncomfortable but with this guy working overnight and my new wool english socks I am happy again with my wingtips!!
customer_reviews.author: Win Win

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they do what they are suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be well made and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: JeffH

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy Shoe Trees?
customer_reviews.text: If you have used different shoe trees and were dissatisfied, let me tell you about the Allen Edmonds Trees. If you have had trees break, bend, or which were simply too wide to fit your shoes, try these. The Allen Edmonds Full Toe Cedar Shoe Tree smells like cedar just like the name says. They fit my shoes perfectly and are obviously made to last. They are intended for people who care about their shoes enough to spend a little more and do the job. If there was a "10" on this scale, they would get it. As my other trees fail, I will replace them with Allen Edmonds.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good product to keep your allen edmonds shoes in tip ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product to keep your allen edmonds shoes in tip top shape. Easy to use, can't complain. They function as expected
customer_reviews.author: Book dude

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: The shoe trees fit my husband's size 11 Allen Edmonds shoes. They smell nice and seem sturdy. Seems like they will last
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: they don't fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: they don't fit correctly. they are too big for my shoes and i got the small.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shoe horn, easy to put in and remove. No finish on it allows it to absorb sweat. Fits my Allen Edmonds shoes well.
customer_reviews.author: Bence T

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Shoe Tree
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy shoe trees. The shoe trees are pricey so I will see how they perform over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Bought second pair. Keeps boots in shape and dry. Use them everyday to deodorize shoes and dry them out.
customer_reviews.author: Korner Man

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe tree that does exactly what it's supposed to do--keeps my Allen Edmonds fresh and looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These shoe trees are supposed to be perfect for allen edmonds shoes. I have a couple pairs of shoes, and it is my understanding that shoe trees keep the shoes looking better longer. I can tell you that proper care keeps you shoes looking better longer. Shoe tree, regular polishing, and not wearing the shoes everyday day after day makes a huge difference. These are perfect, they fit my 13 size shoe, and I have a pair for each pair of shoes I own. Definitely reduces creasing.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Home Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my dress shoes and boots. They are very well made, although the spring takes a little while to loose up at first to compress them enough to get in you shoes. Overall great product. I would recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fits well!
customer_reviews.text: These tree shoes are great and I found the size chart to be accurate for all of my Allen Edmonds shoes in a 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Whann

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased these same shoe trees in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these same shoe trees in the past from an Allen Edmonds store and they had a fresh cedar scent . These did not, possibly indicating they had been on a shelf for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe tree for the price. Does as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: They do their job very well
customer_reviews.text: I have three sets of these shoe trees. I need more!
customer_reviews.author: Professional Dude

customer_reviews.title: Work great, make sure you get the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly over-snug for the Allen Edmonds shoes I bought them for. They do fit into the shoe but can be a challenge to get them out. I think they would be too large for anything smaller than an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Cobler

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: The design and construction of Allen Edmonds shoe trees are exceptional. If you have a quality pair of leather shoes, these are a necessity to ensure a long life of your footwear. They also make your closet smell great.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Schexnayder

customer_reviews.title: Follow sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Bought both XL and XXL for my 13 - 14 shoes. Chart was exactly right: XXL barely fit into the 13 (forced) and tightly into the 14.
customer_reviews.author: Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are remarkable. The rose cedar is especially aromatic. The construction is solid, high quality American craftsmanship. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and does its job well
customer_reviews.text: The Allen Edmonds cedar shoe tree is beautifully crafted, does its job well and keeps shoes looking great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Juyal

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: WHat can I say. This product is exactly as advertised. It's solid, smells wonderfully of cedar, and does its job. Every now and then the stars align and you receive exactly what you hoped for when ordering online... This is one of those times.
customer_reviews.author: PSimon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ODDLY SHAPED THICKNESS AT THE BRIDGE OF THE SHOE TREE KEPT IT FROM FITTING IN MY BOOTS.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for size 9D is M
customer_reviews.text: Recommended for size 9D is M, but it's a tight fit, very hard to remove the trees from the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: curly

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds Full Toe Cedar Shoe Tree, Large
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it keeps the wrinkles out of my shoes and boots. You can't go wrong with this product if you care about your footwear.
customer_reviews.author: JazzCque

customer_reviews.title: Super fast service
customer_reviews.text: Shoe tree came very quickly and fits perfectly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my AE park avenues
customer_reviews.text: These shoe trees arrived perfectly fitting my Park Avenues which were an 8 3E. They are crafted well and I expect them to keep my shoes dry and in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super quality like all of Allen Edmonds products I have purchased so far
customer_reviews.author: Lumencrazy

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using these for about a week but from what I've seen so far they get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib Haroon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product and the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivery to Singapore arrived earlier than expected. Remember to choose a size smaller so the shoe tree fits into the shoe nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have 'em for your good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not much can go wrong with shoe trees unless they are junk. I got these to go with my AE shoes. Completely unnecessary, but they do fit the shoes well and appear to be constructed well. I'm sure I could get decent shoe trees for a third less if I keep my eye out, but I am in no way disappointed that I spent a little extra for these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to go to Allen Edmonds website for correct sizing I ordered 10 !/2 size and they recommended a medium perfect fit! My husband loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Execllent shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe tree that I've ever used. The solid, full-toe design reduces creases without widening the shoe.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend buying this product for each pair
customer_reviews.text: A must have for your AEs. I highly recommend buying this product for each pair.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and in great condition ! The large is a little on the bigger side for a size 9 EEE shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toe cedar shoe tree. Fits perfect for my shoes and recommend this to everyone who has shoes they want to keep nice.

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: These shoe trees perform their function as advertised. Nice, solid construction. Free cedar. Nice smell.

customer_reviews.title: Simple choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fits great. Smells great. Doesn't jam. What more is it supposed to do?
customer_reviews.author: Stuart C Cruikshank

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: I really like the solid toe. The cedar used is very pleasing to the shoe and to look at too.
customer_reviews.author: David Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do exactly what they are suppose to do. Solid build.
customer_reviews.author: Corby Selvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got the large for a size 11 pair of Allen Edmonds. The product is great and fits well, though Amazon sent the combination shoe tree instead of the full toe.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Protect your shoes and prolong their life.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of quality cedar shoe trees. The price can't be beat for AE branded gear. I can't comment on the durability (hence the 4 stars), but the initial quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: shoe tree handling
customer_reviews.text: The cupping pull-up not as elevated/high to grab as would prefer. A raw hide pull on top would be more convenient in dealind with removal.
customer_reviews.author: Rolex2Tophorseman1

customer_reviews.title: Smooth it down
customer_reviews.text: need to smooth it down so as it doesn't scuff inside of the shoes and hope it does tear the leather . I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: These shoe trees will not fit a 13E shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I needed to contact someone about these shoe trees. I waer a size 13e in some of my shoes and these trees are supposed to fit a 13E and they will not go into the shoe completely. The toe part is fine but the heel part is to long to completely go into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

product_meta.title: Allen Edmonds Men's Full Toe Cedar Shoe Tree
product_meta.description:
Natural odor-absorbing Cedar wood.

Keep your wide toed shoe smooth and odor free with these classic shoe trees from Allen Edmonds. Made from aromatic cedar, the two part construction helps to retain the shape of your shoes. Recommended by most fine shoe manufacturers.

Founded in 1922, Allen-Edmonds Shoe Corporation manufactures premium men's footwear, accessories, and cedar products using the philosophy of quality, service and integrity. Taking shoemaking to the level of an art form, each pair of Allen-Edmonds shoes are carefully crafted by hand in a process that includes 212 separate production steps. No detail is too small, because supreme quality is the cornerstone of the Allen-Edmonds name.

See more
feature_bullets: Wide-toe cedar shoe tree with adjustable two-part construction designed to absorb moisture and retain shoe shape
